price: Nutis samiitti ga'uu (feeneti) kan isheen eegdota jajjaboofi qaanqeen (urjii furguuggamtuu) guutamte ishee argine.
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lamasnā al-samāa fawajadnāhā muli-at ḥarasan shadīdan washuhuban
